text: The Cathedral of Astorga () is a Roman Catholic church in Astorga, Spain. It was declared a national monument in 1931. Bishop of this cathedral is Camilo Lorenzo Iglesias (Bishop of Astorga). File:Astorga Catedral 36 by- dpc.jpg|Cathedral interior File:Astorga Catedral 37 by-dpc.jpg|Cathedral altarpiece == Other websites == *Official website *The Art of medieval Spain, A.D. 500-1200, an exhibition catalog from The Metropolitan Museum of Art Libraries (fully available online as PDF), which contains material on Astorga Cathedral (no. 70) Category:Roman Catholic cathedrals in Spain Category:Province of Le√≥n Category:1470s establishments in Europe Category:15th-century buildings and structures
title: Astorga Cathedral
